channel.title: Vincent Delaney on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Vincent Delaney on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: Ampersand
item.description: Things aren’t working out for Kate and Marlowe. He’s an unemployed whiner, and despite her best efforts to stick with him, Kate just couldn’t help cloning him. Twice. When one of the clones slips into Marlowe’s life, and Kate discovers that she might not actually be the original Kate, things get scarier and funnier at the same time. Just what is marriage? And how far will we go to change each other—and ourselves—to stay together?
